dublin_core.dcvalue: Electronic health records EHRs play an important role in the treatment of chronic diseases such as diabetes mellitus Although the interoperability and selected functionality of EHRs are already addressed by a number of standards and best practices such as IHE or HL7 the majority of these systems are still monolithic from a user functionality perspective The purpose of the OntoHealth project is to foster a functionally flexible standards based use of EHRs to support clinical routine task execution by means of workflow patterns and to shift the present EHR usage to a more comprehensive integration concerning complete clinical workflows
Structuring clinical workflows for diabetes care: an overview of the OntoHealth approach.
